trans-unit.target: TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_BERTENNANT_000_02<tab>Didn't you hear me? Come here and I shall guide you.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_ULTA_000_03<tab>Where do you think you're going? The Adventurers' Guild is the <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> way!

TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_CAPUCINE_000_05<tab>Halt! Unregistered outsiders are not permitted beyond this point. If you wish to remain in our city, you must obey our rules and proceed to the Carline Canopy at once.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_ADALHARD_000_10<tab>You're not from around here, are you? You should probably speak with Mother Miounne first. She's over at the Adventurers' Guild counter.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_BERTENNANT_000_15<tab>Within these gates, you are bound by our laws─laws with which you are no doubt unfamiliar.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_BERTENNANT_000_16<tab>Listen well, and I shall guide you.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_FST_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>Welcome to Gridania, a vibrant forest nation cradled in the bosom of nature.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_FST_SYSTEM_000_21<tab>Follow the instructions to move your character and adjust the position of the camera.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_FST_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>When you are ready to proceed, speak to Bertennant.
TEXT_OPENINGGRIDANIA_FST_SYSTEM_000_23<tab>Please select the control scheme you wish to use.
